action.action-desc: Ms. Hahn introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business

form.official-title: To amend the Small Business Act to make permanent the Small Loan Advantage program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the SBA Loan Paperwork Reduction Act of 2013.
Section 7(a) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 636(a)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: The Administrator shall carry out a Small Loan Advantage program in accordance with this paragraph.

Except as otherwise provided under this paragraph, the Administrator shall carry out the Small Loan Advantage program in the same manner as the Small Loan Advantage loan initiative of the Administration—
No limitation under paragraph (25)(A) applies to the Small Loan Advantage program under this paragraph.

The Administrator is authorized to increase the program’s maximum loan amount, to reduce the program’s fees, and to further streamline the program’s loan approval process if the Administrator determines that such adjustments would be fair and appropriate.
